parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

> The time must be in the latest 30 days.

parameters.name: EntityObject
parameters.description: The operation object that you want to query.

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description:
The type of the operation object that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **1**: the IP address of the Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance
*   **2**: Anti-DDoS plans
*   **3**: ECS instances
*   **4**: all logs

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. For example, to query the returned results on the first page, set the value to **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs in Resource Management. This parameter is empty by default, which indicates that the instance belongs to the default resource group.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

> The time must be in the latest 30 days.
